website_summaries.verdict: A good, affordable option if you want a compact design and like the quick preheat feature.
pros: A lightweight machine capable of ecomonically making a variety of coffee and milk-infused beverages
cons: It's a bit on the noisy side when brewing

customer_reviews.title: Hot mess
customer_reviews.text: This machine was a major disappointment. I had my previous Nespresso coffee maker for 8 years and loved it to bits, literally. I bought this as a replacement and can definitely say you get what you pay for. I'm constantly wasting capsules because the load mechanism has to be aligned just precisely right or it jams. The water tank has to be filled like every third coffee. It leaks. I don't know from where. It makes coffee but barely. Wouldn't recommend this purchase at all. I plan to invest in something better quality for sure in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like. Make's great
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like. Make's great, authentic European espresso dead easy. The frother has a cappuccino ready in under a minute. Clean up it almost non-existent. For those willing to spend on average of 70 cents per shot, this is the only way to go. Yes a super-automatic would do as well — but probably not better — at 5 times the cost of the machine. And for those of the Barista temperament, an expensive manual machine is the way to go. Those not wanting to bother to tamper or grind, pre-infuse, and pray to the coffee God's that your shot turns out like you planned, need look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Beginner espresso machine
customer_reviews.text: I like this little machine, takes up less space than the Keurig I had. I wish Nespresso would make a reusable pod, as I love espresso, but other folks would like a simple coffee. The frother however, doesn't seem to spin fast enough to froth anything. I have tried putting in less than any of the max levels and do not get froth. The frother is a $99.00 value and I would probably for go that option and put that cost towards a better frother. I am very disappointed in that.
customer_reviews.author: Karen O.

customer_reviews.title: Love the Machine! The milk frothed not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine! Makes the best expresso and it’s also makes it quickly. Great for on the go. I’ve had this for a few months and I haven’t had a single problem with the machine. However the milk frothed is not my favorite. Doesn’t matter if I fill the milk under the max line it would still over flow and wet my counter. Worked well for a few week and afterwards it was just a mess every time. This picture was a week after I received the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Milk frother combo for sure.
customer_reviews.text: The milk frother is one if my favorite things in the world. It warms and froths the milk perfectly...insane. I bought a nespresso system after a trip to Europe where it was everywhere and phenomenally good. Stores had sections with cartridges one better than the next. I had always been resistant to the cartridge waste but the coffee is so good and I am so into coffee that my value hierarchy required that I buy a nespresso system. I probably have every coffee making system and it is top three in my opinion. For speed, ease, quality and cleanup...so good.
customer_reviews.author: Sherman

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: We love it. It’s like having a coffee bar in your house. Very straightforward to use. Milk frother does get dirty easily and needs to be washed with soap after almost every time, I don’t know why that is. Some milk always gets a little stuck to the bottom. Not an issue just pointing it out. Espresso machine is very easy to use, works quickly, makes delicious espresso. Love that there are so many varieties of the pods too. Overall my whole family has been obsessed with this thing and I highly recommend if you’re a latte/cappuccino/espresso lover!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a Nespresso machine AND an Aeroccino
customer_reviews.text: Great price for brewer AND an Aeroccino ....but the brewer itself is very small and doesn’t have many features (and has a very small water reservoir). I used it for a while, enough to realize how much I LOVE Nespresso, and then bought a newer/bigger/better machine from KitchenAid. But it was still worth the price, since it was basically the same as buying the Aeroccino...and getting a free brewing machine with it. BTW, I LOVE the Aeroccino...how did I not know about this until now?
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: I dont even know what blending power is but I gave it a 5 because this thing is overall pretty darn cool. I gave it a 5 for easy to clean but it does smudge, usually its my fault [ ::take a moment to grasp the fact that I am defending an espresso machine, publicly. Has to mean good things, right?:: ]. After I wash my hands I put on lotion and I'm always washing my hands so it sucks but otherwise this thing is legit.
customer_reviews.author: Prissy

customer_reviews.title: Defective! Do not buy this product. It did not work from the very first day
customer_reviews.text: I received this product for my birthday. I was super excited to get out of bed and use it this morning. The machine was really loud but the Nespresso came out well. I’m fortunately it wasn’t very hot. Then I tried to use the aerator to make the milk hot and steamy And it wouldn’t work at all. I read through all the directions and tried all of the problem-solving suggestions. When I push the button and it would turn blue and stay on for only two seconds and then shut off. Nothing I just changed it. I am incredibly disappointed and would not buy this or recommend this product to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: I am a total covert - love, love, love this machine
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I feel like I'm in an Italian cafe in my home. Makes great espresso drinks. Even though pods are somewhat expensive, they are easy to use and quality product. Most of all, convenient and less expensive than a drink from a coffee house with a white and green logo. Plan on picking up a bunch of pods on next overseas trip since they are half the price overseas.
customer_reviews.author: IrishMargie

customer_reviews.title: Leaks and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to not cheap out on an espresso maker so I bought the Nespresso one figuring it’s made by a reputable company. This is the biggest pile of trash I’ve ever bought. It literally leaked but I tried to justify keeping it. After a week I realized I would regret it so I thankfully was able to return it to amazon. What junk.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Z

customer_reviews.title: Fun new toy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my new office and I've been so pleased. It's so much fun to make my own lattes and such- especially with my favorite pods and plant milk of choice. It works really well and quickly, although it's a little loud (for 15 seconds only) Make sure if you buy this to order pods from the website and get the recycling bag for free! I've had it for about a month and I'm still enjoying espresso every day. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lara W.

customer_reviews.title: Life changing.
customer_reviews.text: Literally, I am so overly joyful about this. Anyone who I have talked with in the last week knows that I bought it and love it lol. It comes with a nice variety of specialty coffees, decaffeinated, espresso shots, and different roasts of coffees. The machine is beautiful and sleek, along with the frother. It literally makes coffee shop quality drinks, hot and cold. I switched from my Keurig (which my husband still uses, so no shade) and I'm completely obsessed!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Much Better Than Keurig
customer_reviews.text: We have a Kuerig and this. Absolutely LOVE the espresso and Lungo it produces. One cup from this is far better than the Keurig. We like the Bustelo capsules as well as the Nespresso. We use it 3 or 4 times a day and hasn't failed at all. Easy to clean. Frother makes milk into foam easily. Love the agitator in it.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Cimorelli

customer_reviews.title: Been really pleased
customer_reviews.text: I have been really pleased with this product. Sometimes the delivery is inconsistent. I am still learning all the details about caring for and resetting this product, and get the best out of it. But despite that, I have really enjoyed it now that I am making all my coffee at home due to the pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Lexis B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! But loud.
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine. So much more convenient then a standard espresso machine. I hated cleaning the steaming arm. The frother is a dream! No mess. No fuss. Just perfection. Only two minor complaints on the Nespresso machine itself...I literally have only one cup that is small enough to fit under it, yet large enough to hold the coffee. I wish the shelf were lower. Also, the machine is super loud! Only while brewing so it only lasts a minute or so, but definitely no early morning lattes without waking the house. I do highly recommend this gadget! Hands down!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: There are two problems with this unit
customer_reviews.text: Problem 1: I'm one of those people who can't tolerate hot drinks. But, even for me, the drink isn't hot enough. One of the joys of drinking coffee is its temperature. This isn't it. Very disappointing. Problem 2: Aeroccino's foam is TOO foamy. I have a home espresso machine with milk steamer. I know how milk is supposed to be steamed and how much air and foam there is supposed to be for a latte. This machine just makes milk into a huge foam ball. I wish I could return it. But, it's past return window......
customer_reviews.author: ocwaveoc

customer_reviews.title: New mom’s lifeblood
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my birthday. Let me tell you, it changed my life. No more Starbucks runs, and better yet- no more gross cold coffee! I can make iced lattes on demand so I don’t have to choke down lukewarm drip coffee. It’s fast to heat up, quick to brew a shot, and everything is recyclable! Love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Christine McNeight

customer_reviews.title: Super machine. I was so excited to get because ...
customer_reviews.text: Super machine. I was so excited to get because my niece has one and every time I visited her I enjoyed the little espressos so much! We got ours and wow, it was just in the box it came in with a thin Amazon box covering it. Was so worried because there are so many breakable parts. But no! The Nespresso itself was packaged well enough to withstand shipping. No one is no more surprised than I! Everything works great.
customer_reviews.author: V G-Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I now use this exclusively. It’s great. Very small and compact. Doesn’t take up a lot of space. Love the storage space of the used pods. Heats up quickly. Instant coffee that’s frothy and creamy. Coffee is hot. The frothier is great too. Easy to use. Easy to clean. Makes beautiful frothy milk.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Williams

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these on Black Friday. They both had issues early on but I was able to get them to work with a hard reset. Now, one of them does not dispense coffee anymore. Customer service for Delonghi has not returned my emails so I can’t force them to honor the manufacturer’s warranty and it’s not returnable through Amazon. Pretty shameful that the product didn’t even last a year.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Bouvier

customer_reviews.title: Simple , easy to use , delicious coffee
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this if you are easily addicted to great coffee . Once you find your favorite flavor there is no going back . Totally awesome machine and product . Easy, simple operation .My friend recommended this original machine as opposed to the newer version which she tried and didn’t like as much . They use different shaped pods that are not interchangeable.
customer_reviews.author: SMG

customer_reviews.title: but it's working great! The pods made for nespresso fit just fine
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this a week so far, but it's working great! The pods made for nespresso fit just fine, they don't ever have any issue with getting smashed if they are inserted correctly. The milk frother also works great, I believe one negative review on Amazon was due to operator error, they were likely not using the lid that comes in the box. The only very minor issue I've had so far is if I don't sit the water tank just perfectly on the back of the unit it won't take up the water. When that happens I just stop the machine, lift and re-insert the water tank again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Defective system
customer_reviews.text: I have to start by saying I've owned a Nespresso machine since the beginning.. And I love this company. Nevertheless I have to leave a bad review this time as this machine is a mess. 1. When you use this machine the lid / handle pops up in the middle unless you hold it down the whole time. If that happens the whole capsule explodes and makes a mess. 2. When using a big cup you have to fold the base, what happens is that the base doesn't stay up and knocks down the cup. You can imagine the mess.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Study the different models prior to purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Crushed coffee pods. Had to use fingers to guide pod to correct position. Other models have a more streamlined top slot with easier pod access. Returned item and disappointed with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Altair

customer_reviews.title: Absolute best coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Just love this machine! It makes the best coffee ever....beautiful crema and great taste! It is small and easy to use. The aerochino is great also but watch your milk. We have had issues with some milk foaming much better than others. Sometimes even just the age of the milk will affect it. I don't think it is the product's fault though. So far (almost 2 years) this is a WINNER!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah I.

customer_reviews.title: Very Low Quality Espresso Machine
customer_reviews.text: The machine is really low quality, the milk frother doesn't work most of the time, the machine is very noisy and you cant use it in the morning if anyone still sleeping at home, I think its a waste on money and for sure recommend to search for a different one with a higher capacity
customer_reviews.author: Ziad

customer_reviews.title: Frother died within a month!
customer_reviews.text: This thing was working great...easy to use, good coffee, but then on the fourth week the frother became a hit or miss working device. Now all it does is spin for a short time and heat up the milk. NO FROTH! I need to find out what my options are, not good that this thing did not last long!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper#10M

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and our friend loves it. She no longer goes to coffee shops because she has her own at home now. It is awesome. Totally recommend it. The pods are not to bad either for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Grant T. Thimsen

customer_reviews.title: Coffee machine is great, frother is a disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the ease and quality of the coffee made by this machine. For the first two months no problems. Unfortunately the frother will no longer produce excellent froth. What we get now is milky not frothy. I bought the package as one so not sure if I can do a partial return or the whole combo goes back. Any tips on the Aerocinno frother are appreciated. I hate to part with it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Mazza

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is easy to use and produces delicious drinks. I love that it doesn’t take up a lot of space too!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alysha&Kori

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy used from Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: This machine arrived covered in styrofoam, and after spending 30 minutes picking out little styrofoam pieces, I found out that some of the components were from a different model and were not compatible, so the machine would not go together. I’m going to be picking up styrofoam dots around my kitchen for weeks, and it’s all for nothing. This was pretty infuriating and I won’t by used or from Amazon warehouse again. Not inspected enough I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Willman

customer_reviews.title: The coffee machine is great so far, but milk frother doesn't work after only one week!
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to give 5 stars for the coffee machine, it's easy to use, quick and taste good. But the milk frother won't make milk foam after one week! I've done some search it seems like this is a common problem to this model. If you're looking for a milk frother, avoiding buying this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes perfect morning espresso!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have to be just for morning but that's when we use it most. The frother is so handy. We make a quick latte and head out the door with our delicious hot beverage in hand! Works perfectly and makes great tasting coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit of a pain
customer_reviews.text: I like the convenience of dropping in a pod and pushing a button. I don't like having to always order more pods online. I don't like that the frother always. I also feel that if you stop the frother before it overflows then the milk is nowhere near hot enough. My sister has the frother but hers has two attachments so she puts the one attachment that doesn't froth as much to avoid the overflow. Mine either came without a choice of attachments or I never noticed it in the box and it was inadvertently thrown out with the Christmas wrapping paper. Sadly I couldn't find any description of the frother that mentioned how many attachments
customer_reviews.author: luvboots

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, this thing. I prefer espresso over a cup of coffee and now I can have a fast cup of espresso every morning.. I usually end up drinking 2 or 3 cups each morning. I recommend this item without any qualms.
customer_reviews.author: LeiLani Graham

customer_reviews.title: The machine was defective twice
customer_reviews.text: First, nespresso is for me the best coffe, but, this machine that i bought here in amazon was defective, first the aeroccino didnt work, so they remplace me all the bundle so, it was a lost time, to return and receive the new machine and aeroccino, so now the aeroccino works well but the machine stop working some times, and I dont know but it damage the capsules and is so frustrainging for me, Amazon sell defective machines and i dont recommended to buy here
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every single penny! This thing gets used atleast ...
customer_reviews.text: Worth every single penny! This thing gets used atleast once a day and has saved us a lot of money since we can make our own lattes and cappuccinos. Just make sure when you use the frother, do not put more than the line or else it will leak all over. Only down side is it’s very loud compared to the Keurig.
customer_reviews.author: YuChris

customer_reviews.title: The best espresso ever
customer_reviews.text: One of the best espressos and cappucinos I’ve ever had. Amazing crema. Run it with filtered water to be safe and run it once without a cup before each use and it’ll last forever. Just take care of it. Nespresso “sells” FREE recyclable bags for their pods so it’s enviromentally friendly. 10000000x better than Keurig, although it’s only good for espresso based beverages.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working properly after only 5 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, I love the Nespresso machines. Problem is, I buy this one and now that its past the time to return it.... it is not working properly and I'm stuck with it. After 5 weeks use, this machine will only make coffee if I hold the button down while it brews. If I release the button, it stops brewing and I have to unplug and plug it back in to reset. Seriously wish I had bought it directly from Nespresso and not from Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca F.

customer_reviews.title: Love this ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love Love this! Recently went on vacation to Europe, this was in our apartment! Super fast, easy and taste great! Husband bought this for me for Christmas he knew how much I wanted it! My kids love using it too!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Eames-Geurin

customer_reviews.title: Alnmost a 5.
customer_reviews.text: My first Nespresso machine and it is a great little machine. The only thing I don't like is that i wish the coffee got a little bit hotter. It is hot, but just not enough to how I like it. That is the only reason for 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Peter R.

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful machine- my husband doesn’t have much patience for brewing ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful machine- my husband doesn’t have much patience for brewing a pot of coffee and prefers espresso (big kick with little volume). He is able to get a coffee in under a minute on his way out for work or if he needs a boost when he gets home. Very happy that we made the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Rose

customer_reviews.title: Received Used Machine Missing Parts!
customer_reviews.text: I love Nespresso machines WHEN THEY ARE WORKING! I got one because we have one in our office that works amazing and has for more than two years with constant use. This is the third one I have had to return to Amazon. The other two had mechanical problems and this one was just the main machine (no blender) that seems to be an attempted return. Really an Amazon problem but seems to occur a ton with the Nespresso machines.
customer_reviews.author: Minuial

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I really Love the coffee that this machine produces but it leaks everywhere. Can’t fiqure out why??
customer_reviews.author: Michell Ervin

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great cup of espresso and fast
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a power house. We went on a cruise and our room had one in it so we had to get one for our home. Makes great espresso ,such a treat to have everyday. Easy to clean and the pods are recyclable.
customer_reviews.author: Julie H

customer_reviews.title: Classic espresso with no mess
customer_reviews.text: Classic coffee, generates a bit of waste though with the used capsules. The capsules are very small and aluminum. Plenty of reviews out there. We tried this while on vacation in Australia. Makes a great espresso shot. The frother make VERY thick creamy foam.
customer_reviews.author: Noneya!

customer_reviews.title: Defective on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: The product was defective. The free “gift” of coffee pod samples was passed the use by date. After an afternoon of trying to troubleshoot, Amazon Customer Service put me in touch with Nespresso, who advised me to return for refund or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: J.Hakim

customer_reviews.title: Just love it!
customer_reviews.text: Glad they added a few different flavors, some made head spin in the wrong way .. ha. I have used this machine years ago in an office setting, and couldn't wait to have my own. Best investment for myself!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanene Kelly

customer_reviews.title: My covfefe experience has seen a drastic change
customer_reviews.text: I love coffee specifically espressos and cappuccinos. I used to own an espresso machine and used to make cappuccino everyday and it was a mini project in itself. With this product, the whole scene has changed. I just press a button and coffee is brewed and milk is frothed. Clean time is down to seconds from minutes. Its been a few months now and no complaints so far. So all in all a great purchase. Lets see.
customer_reviews.author: Dushyanth Subramanya

customer_reviews.title: Mint quality!
customer_reviews.text: Even though it said used, everything arrived brand new with factory seals! It works great and I’m so happy I saved half the money for the same thing buying it here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very loud motor
customer_reviews.text: The coffee is wonderful. Coffee with warm frothed milk is out of this world! Yummy! The motor is VERY loud. It's difficult to make a 150 - 180 ml cup of coffee because the cup does not fit unless you flip up the shelf, but then you have to hold the cup in place while brewing.
customer_reviews.author: Myriam

customer_reviews.title: lovely espresso machine
customer_reviews.text: I had the same machine before, my mom wanted to keep it when I moved out from our home, I ended up getting a new one, I just love it
customer_reviews.author: Fatima Mahmoudi

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: I like this coffee machine, easy to use and clean. The only one just a little expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Frother not functional
customer_reviews.text: The product worked fine until the milk frother stopped working. It just heats up the milk but doesn't create any froth anymore. We tried reporting the issue on July 9th when the frother stopped working but were told to call up Product Support next day between 5am to 1pm. Please fix the frother or send us a replacement one.
customer_reviews.author: Shefali Malhotra Ahuja

customer_reviews.title: Terrible machine
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe that I received a malfunction machine. It doesn’t work, have to return it
customer_reviews.author: Annie T

customer_reviews.title: Good machine for those short on cash or time
customer_reviews.text: Very straightforward machine, like a Keurig for espresso. The milk frother is an excellent value and perfect addition. Great budget and time friendly machine.
customer_reviews.author: Joe A.

customer_reviews.title: super low maintenance machine
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy this bundle for quick espresso/latte making in the morning or when entertaining guests. It works great and is super easy to clean. The only downside is that the latte is NOT hot. So if you want a hot beverage, stick to espresso or lungo.
customer_reviews.author: Amzn Nar

customer_reviews.title: Original always the best
customer_reviews.text: love the ease of the Nespresso. I bought the original for the pods, not the wide pods. the machine is great because you can still get boiling water by not putting in a pod. the selection of flavours is great and free delivery with a minimum purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ycnan Oravel

customer_reviews.title: Love my bundle!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. The espresso leaks inside of the cup catcher a bit more than I would like, but the coffee it makes is great. I love the lattes I now make in the morning way better than Starbucks and most competitors. Nespresso makes very tasty coffee and trying them all has been great. I love my machine and the frother!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: I put it into a 220V electricity and burst it I never used
customer_reviews.text: Works only on 110V electricity Think a product like this supposedly works on 110V and 220V I put it into a 220V electricity and burst it I never used
customer_reviews.author: malek

customer_reviews.title: Good espresso
customer_reviews.text: Makes great espresso but the directions leave a lot to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: In-House Barista!
customer_reviews.text: Love the coffee maker and the milk frother and my husband loves the fact that I am now his personal Starbucks!!
customer_reviews.author: CheapScapes

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Espresso quality is impressive considering the level of convenience. Frother is easy to use and clean. If I’m being extra particular, I wish the machine dripped less into the collection container, and I felt like regular milk froths up more than with the aeroccino’s I’ve used in the past- fine for cappuccinos but not ideal for lattes. Still, it’s by far the best gift I’ve gotten myself in a long time, I use it almost daily and save a ton of money on coffee shop purchases. Highly recommend if you’re a daily espresso drinker!
customer_reviews.author: Justine Stottlemyer

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Addict
customer_reviews.text: Love this, we use it every morning, my husband loves that it warms up fast and makes a great espresso fast in the morning to head out the door for work.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Great consistent coffee
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is the cost of the pods, they are 2 to 3 times more expensive in the USA than Europe. Other than that, great coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: David Howarth

customer_reviews.title: Nespresso rules
customer_reviews.text: Love my Nespresso machine ! Great coffee great frother !
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie C Talbert

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: The first machine did not work..I exchanged it for a new one and that one did not work either. I had bought this for my sister because I have this same machine from Nespresso, so i know how it works and it works fine for me. I don’t recommend ordering from this vendor since there is something wrong with the machines.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Pecora

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.text: "free" mild frother broken in under 30 days and the capsules get stuck. I can't tell you how many capsules were waisted. DO NOT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Ann E. Rea

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I have one for work and one for home! LOVE THIS MACHINE! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kervin D.

customer_reviews.title: YES!! These is great!
customer_reviews.text: Use it every day, so good. Small on the counter and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Amazong

product_meta.description: Color:BlackCompact, lightweight and equipped with an ergonomic handle, the Nespresso Inissia by De'Longhi is a smart little machine to make your life easier and fit perfectly into any interior design. Simple to use, it offers an impeccable barista-style coffee every time, thanks to its simple, one-touch operation and patented extraction system which delivers up to 19 bar pressure. A fast-heat up time means the water reaches the ideal temperature in just 25 seconds, while a folding drip tray allows for taller recipe glasses and an energy saving mode automatically switches the machine off after 9 minutes to make your life easier. Each machine includes a welcome set with a variety of Nespresso capsules containing individual aromas. This bundle includes the Nespresso Inissia machine by De'Longhi and the Aeroccino 3 milk frother. The Aeroccino 3 creates a smooth, finely textured hot or cold fresh milk froth in a few seconds, without noise or vibration.
feature_bullets: Barista grade: Nespresso Inissia by De'Longhi offers an impeccable single-serve Coffee or Espresso cup every time, thanks to its automatic operation and patented extraction system which delivers up to 19 bars of pressure. Speed: In just one touch, ideal water temperature is reached in 25 seconds and you are ready to make 9 single-serve cups of Coffee without having to refill the 24 ounce tank. This automatic Coffee machine gets your perfect cup of Coffee or Espresso to you fast.
Bundle: The Aeroccino 3 milk frother is included to create the perfect finish to your single-serve Coffee beverages such as Cappuccino or Latte.

Energy efficient coffee machine: Brew two different cup sizes; Espresso (1.35 ounce) and Lungo (5 ounce), with just the touch of a button. Pour over ice to create your favorite iced Coffee drinks. With the smart energy saving mode automatically switches off our Coffee maker after 9 only minutes.
Versatile and smart coffee machine: Adjustable cup size with two programmable Espresso and Lungo buttons. A folding drip tray accommodates larger single-serve cup sizes and recipes
Complimentary gift: Each Espresso machine includes a Nespresso Original capsule welcome kit with a range of capsules with unique aroma profiles.
